name: OpenHands
title: daytona.io
shortDescription: OpenHands, powered by Daytona, offers an AI-driven workspace for developers and teams. It integrates tools like shell, browser, editor, and planner into a single environment, enabling seamless end-to-end work. Ideal for large-scale projects, it supports code refactoring, migration, and troubleshooting while handling multiple tasks simultaneously. This tool is especially useful for enterprises seeking to boost productivity and automate repetitive tasks.
pros: Supports parallel processing for increased productivity
cons: Potential high cost for enterprise level

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: GitHub Copilot
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: AI pair programmer that suggests code
